item.title: Largest product in a grid
item.description: Problem 11 Description In the 20×20 grid below, four numbers along a diagonal line have been marked in red. The product of these numbers is 26 × 63 × 78 × 14 = 1788696. What is the greatest product of four adjacent numbers in the same direction (up, down, left, right, or diagonally) in the 20×20 grid? Solution 1 2 3 4
